function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased recreational activity during the COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Encourage responsible use of green spaces, enforce social distancing measures, and promote outdoor activities with low transmission risk","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns, mobile apps for monitoring crowd density, and virtual activity classes","People":"General public, particularly those using green spaces","Owner":"Local authorities, health organizations, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Substitution of prohibited indoor activities with outdoor activities","Impact":"Potential for mass gatherings, close contact, and increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote responsible outdoor activities, enforce gathering restrictions, and provide safe outdoor fitness options","Technologies":"Online booking systems for outdoor fitness classes, crowd density monitoring tools, and virtual activity tracking apps","People":"General public, especially individuals seeking outdoor fitness alternatives","Owner":"Government agencies, fitness organizations, and community centers"},{"Description":"Lack of empirical data on the impact of systemic shifts in urban design on inhabitants","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding the benefits of urban green infrastructure and potential risk factors","Mitigation":"Invest in research and data collection on the impact of urban design on public health, promote the use of urban green infrastructure, and integrate health impact assessments into urban planning","Technologies":"Urban health monitoring systems, GIS mapping for green infrastructure, and data analytics tools for urban development","People":"Urban planners, public health officials, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and urban development organizations"}]}
